original_text: The chief priests and the whole Sanhedrin were looking for false evidence against Jesus so that they could put him to death.
korean_text: 대제사장들과 온 공회가 예수를 죽이려고 그를 칠 거짓 증거를 찾으매

sentences.original_text: The chief priests and the whole Sanhedrin
so that they could put him to death
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그들이 그를 죽일 수 있도록
